name: Meraki CISCO, Sydney
desc: A redesign of Meraki CISCO’s Sydney office - to better accommodate their team’s unique & flexible working styles, all within a cost effective solution

blocks.caption: Rearrangeable cluster desks for teams, window seating, phone booths and quiet acoustic meeting spaces provide a dynamic and flexible working space.
Dining & Breakout Area provides a number of seating options
Tiered seating in the dining/breakout area doubles as company seating during large internal meetings - supplemented by drop down projector screens.

blocks.title: Space to Move
blocks.copy: The Meraki CISCO team value variety in their workspace. To accommodate this, the plan includes a number of ad- hoc working spaces, as well as breakout couches and booths around the entire perimeter of the office, ensuring there’s always space to move.

blocks.title: For Flexible Teams
blocks.copy: As Meraki CISCO’s teams work in a variety of styles, their space needs to adapt to match – accommodating everything from large stakeholder workshops, close team collaboration, and focused, individual work.

blocks.caption: Zonal breakdown of floor plan. Blue: Workspace. Purple: Meeting, Red: Recreation, Navy: Kitchen & Breakout, Yellow: Entry, Green: Outdoor.

blocks.title: Not Just For Work
blocks.copy: A productive work environment is about more than just work. High-performing teams need to be mindful of mental & physical health, so the offices include several spaces to relax & recharge – including a yoga & games spaces.
